content: दासः {@--1@} A slave, servant in general; गृहकर्मदासाः <ls>Bh. 1. 1</ls>; गृह°, कर्म° &c. {@--2@} A fisherman. {@--3@} A Śūdra, a man of the fourth caste. {@--4@} A knowing man, one who knows the universal spirit. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Vṛtrāsura. {@--6@} A demon. {@--7@} A savage, barbarian (<ab>opp.</ab> आर्य). {@--8@} A worthy recipient (दानपात्र). {@--9@} A word added to the name of a Śūdra; <ab>cf.</ab> गुप्त.
